  • Guide
    • Basic usage
    • Advanced usage
  • Send file
    • Select the file to send
    • Confirmation of documents sent
    • Select the send method (Send publicly)
    • Waiting for the receiving device to receive.
  • Receive file
    • Click the receive button on the home page.
    • Select receive method
    • View downloaded and downloaded tasks
  • Send file to browser
    • Select the file to send
    • Select the send method (downloadable list)
    • View URL and wait for receiving device to receive
    • Use “Chorme” to access the address and select the desired file to download
  • Send file to Kindle
    • Select the file to send
    • Select the send method (downloadable list)
    • View URL and wait for receiving device to receive
    • Use the Kindle's "Experimental Browser" to access the address
    • Select the desired file to download
  • Common equipment
    • (Receiver)Go to device information for device information QR code
    • (Sender)Go to common equipment and add
    • (Sender)Select the bound device when sending a file
    • (Sender)Waiting for the receiving device to receive
    • (Receiver)Notification message received
    • (Receiver)Click on the notification message to enter the app and start downloading
    • (Receiver)Download complete
  • Quick copy clipboard text
    • Operating premise
    • Copy text to clipboard
    • Select Quick Copy Text
    • Copy the received text
  • Share files in other apps
    • Open ”Gallery“
    • Select the file to send
    • Select the send method (Send publicly)
    • Waiting for the receiving device to receive.
  • Automatically store images and videos in albums
    • Go to settings to turn on the "Auto stored to album" option
    • Authority to grant requests
    • Setup complete

# Quick copy clipboard text

Operating app version: Android v2.2.0

TIP

The screenshot uses the Android version, and there are some differences in the interface with other versions of the client

# Operating premise

This feature requires v2.2.0 or later and add each other as common devices. For common devices, please check Common equipment first

# Copy text to clipboard

# Select Quick Copy Text

TIP

If you can't find the device or can't receive the file, please check Can't find the device when receiving files?

# Copy the received text
